function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'printf' to reach function 'main'?

loop_reachability: Is it possible that the loop with condition 'i < n-1' is never executed?

Is the loop with condition 'j < n-i-1' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i < n-1' without passing through its header block?

data_dependency: Is variable 'xp (line 2)' used after its definition?

liveness: Does variable 'xp' remain in use at the end of function 'swap'?
Is variable 'temp' live at the end of function 'swap'?
dead_code: Can the statement 'int main()' be considered dead code?
